item.title: i3wm - How to change wallpaper
item.description: If you’re using i3wm as your favourite window tiling manager, you have noticed that wallpaper channot be changed in an easy ways - like double clicky on the desktop. This just bacuse you cannot clicky on Desktop and also there is no menu to do that. So… how to solve this tremenouds lack? A terminal file manager called Ranger could help use, with a custom script and a image viewer.

item.title: Why I switched again from Linux to Windows
